title: SAF Consumption in the airline network with custom solver and model
description: Developed a model for sustainable aviation fuel distribution and consumption across airline networks.

title: Collaborative Purchasing of Goods
description: Result of my Master's Thesis Work. Game Theory and Mechanism Design for Collaborative Purchasing of Goods. The project aims to develop a game-theoretic model for collaborative purchasing of goods utilizing Greenhouse Gas Protocol Scope 3 emissions rules.

title: Aviation Noise's affect on Boston
description: This study explores how noise levels from Boston Logan Airport propagate across neighborhoods in Boston and Cambridge. Using a scrollytelling format, users are guided through an interactive narrative that highlights the impact of airport noise on local communities.

title: SAF Location Optimization
description: Uses Gurobi and Julia to optimize the location of SAF production facilities in the US. The model minimizes costs while meeting SAF demand and location of feedstock supply.

title: Climate Tech Project Financing
description: In Progress: Develop a framework for financing climate tech projects using a combination of public and private funding sources. The project aims to identify the most effective financing strategies for different types of climate tech projects, taking into account factors such as project size, location, and technology type.
